item.title: About The7 Shop

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row margin_top="0" margin_bottom="10" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="40" parallax_speed="0.1"][vc_column width="1/1" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12"][dt_fancy_title title="The7 Shop" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="26px"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="left" padding="0" margin_top="7" margin_bottom="20" margin_right="30" margin_left="0" width="330" animation="none" media="" image_alt="" hd_image="" image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/demo/shop/wp-content/uploads/sites/7/2014/04/shop08.jpg"][/dt_fancy_image]Phasellus consequat felisrdiet posuere lacus, ac commodo eros aliquet vitae scelerisque erat ligula ac iaculis nullos. Cras pretium aliquot congue lectus mi, tincidunt quis nisi vitae, sodales sodales libero. Quisque a felis aliquot for elemi pentum. Aenean libero libero, porttitor at tellus ut, luctus pulvinar. Mauris euismod ante a mauris ultrices malesuada. ivamus tempus gravida elit, eu accumsan dui consectetur sed. Phasellus ipsum risus, sodales ac mauris at, rutrum mattis purus. Aliquam aliquet magna quis justo laoreet, eget arcu libero libero porttitor at tellus tempus gravida elit dolor for amet ipsum ipsum risus sodales ac mauris at rutrum mattis purus. Nulla facilisi. Curabitur ut aliquam arcu, id pulvinar purus. Duis iaculis non nisl. Quisque a felis aliquam lectus mi, tincidunt quis nisi vitae, sodales sodales libero.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/1" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12"][dt_fancy_title title="Our philosophy" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="33px"][dt_call_to_action content_size="normal" text_align="left" background="fancy" line="true" style="0" animation="none"]
Best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.

item.title: Woo shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Theme was tested with following shortcodes:
  1. List of categories
  2. Featured products
  3. Sale products
  4. Recent products
  5. Top rated products
  6. Best selling products
  7. Products from categories
  8. Product attribute
  9. Products by ID or SKU
  10. Single product by SKU or ID
  11. Product page by SKU or ID

item.title: Terms and conditions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Terms and conditions. Integer vitae ante vitae mauris ipsum massa lorem ipsum dolor ipsum massa sed turpis aliquam eleifend id pulvinar vulputate tristique urna, nec feugiat lorem ipsum dolor nulla aliquam eleifend id pulvinar metus sed turpis.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="30px"][dt_vc_list style="2" bullet_position="top" dividers="false"]
  • Magna phasellus euismod ante;
  • Mauris euismod anteultrices;

item.title: Shop Q & A
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row margin_top="0" margin_bottom="-50" padding_left="0" padding_right="0" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1"][vc_column width="1/1" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12"][dt_fancy_title title="We are usually asked about" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="26px"][vc_accordion style="3" active_tab="false" collapsible="yes"][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add Google map?"][vc_column_text]Google Map shortcode simplifies the process of Google map HTML code embedding. Click on the Map widget in Visual Composer Visit Google maps to create your map.
  1. Find location;
  2. Click “Share” and make sure map is public on the web;
  3. Click folder icon to reveal “Embed on my site” link;
  4. Copy iframe code and paste it in Map embed iframe field in the widget.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove blinking fullscreen background in wide layout?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Background under the box -> Remove an image -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add iconfont icons to the main menu?"][vc_column_text]Icons can be assigned via Appearance -> Menus -> Click on a single menu item -> “Icon” property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to make the site narrower or wider?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Content width -> Enter the desired site width in pixels or percentages -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to disable breadcrumbs?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> Page titles -> Breadcrumbs -> Disable -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How many slideshows am I able to create?"][vc_column_text]You are able to create as many slideshows as you want and use them on any page or post.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="What cache plugin do you suggest to use?"][vc_column_text]We would like to advise you to install W3 Total Cache plugin.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can I use Widgets in Visual Composer?"][vc_column_text]Yes, you can ad widget areas with the help of Widgetised Sidebar shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to change the number of columns in footer?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Footer & Bottom Bar -> Footer -> Footer Layout -> Layout -> Enter the desired footer structure, f.e. 1/2+1/4+1/4 -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I activate Slider Revolution?"][vc_column_text]The notice about Slider Revolution registration is a suggestion, not a requirement. The plugin is registered on Dream-Theme, and buyers of this theme do not need to register it once again. So, for now, could you please simply disregard the notice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove a gap between slideshow and content?"][vc_column_text]There are 50px gaps between header and content area, content area and footer. You can add negative top and bottom margins (-50) in Visual Composer row setting to remove these gaps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][vc_empty_space height="50px"][dt_fancy_title title="Didn’t find the answer?" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="26px"][vc_column_text]Morbi ut mauris non ligula euismod dignissim ac ut orci. Nulla sodales tempus turpis, non interdum orci gravida eget. Nam suscipit et neque at pulvinar.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="26px"][dt_contact_form fields="name,email,message" message_height="5" required="name,email,message" button_title="Send question" button_size="medium"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/1" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12"][dt_fancy_title title="Useful information" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][dt_banner target_blank="true" bg_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)" bg_opacity="35" text_color="rgba(229,229,229,0.2)" text_size="normal" border_width="0" outer_padding="0" inner_padding="0" min_height="220" link="http://themeforest.net/user/Dream-Theme/portfolio?ref=Dream-Theme" type="uploaded_image" image_id="35744"]
